title: (15968) - 7 Rúa dos Estudantes
description: Motorhome parking in Ribeira on the urban beach of Coroso, 1 km from the center of Ribeira, connected by a promenade and a bike path to the center of Ribeira. It has drinking water service. Natural environment in the shade of large trees a few steps from the sand of the beach. It has a beach bar (Chiringuito Quimera) where they program live music in the afternoons after the beach. Gas station just 200 meters away, also selling butane gas. We do not have gray and black water discharge. We would like to have more services but we are not allowed to do more due to the coastal location.

title: (15968) Ribeira - 4 Rúa dos Estudantes
description: Car parks behind the institutes, in front of the beach at the end of the street, a quiet place, be careful to park the caravan well in the parking lines, there is a local police fine in front of you, there is also a beach bar where you can have a slush and have a quiet drink, go around the roundabout and enter along the street that is in front and continue to the left there is a sports pavilion and to the right a school follow the street and you have two esplanades to park your car.

name: Camping Coroso
title: (15959) Camping Coroso
description: Camping Coroso

title: (15968) Ribeira - 10 Estrada Dean Grande
description: Free parking a few meters from the sea line. During the day it is frequented by some cars but at night it is almost deserted. Very quiet and close to Coroso beach

title: () Riveira - 53 Avenida Malecón
description: Very large parking in the port, perfect for visiting the town. It has no services.

title: (15968) Ribeira - 5 Lugar Outeiro
description: Newly opened Car wash with the possibility to wash motorhomes. Has 3 place for normal cars/vans and one for trucks/motorhomes with the maximum height of 5m. Amazing new machines with really good products to wash of all the dirt with ease. Also option for hot water with soap! Prices are really good. Best in Galicia! Near future will include waste water disposal, water filling, and paying by card. Now, make sure you have coins!  Also vending machines and rest area for the family until you finish the washing ;)

title: () Riveira - Porto Grande Ribeira
description: Parking on the harbor Nice place, sea view and port, a little noisy in the morning from the buses parked at the end of the car park, free

title: (15960) Ribeira - 2 Rúa Castillejos
description: Ample parking on the shore of the promenade. It has shadow. The road is next, there is noise from cars so I do not recommend it for overnight. Leisure area and shops, next door

title: (15960) O Touro - 8 DP-7307
description: Along the road, beach show toilets at 200m. Location near Santa Uxía de Ribeiro

title: (15959) Insuela - 2 Rúa Esteirón
description: Very nice picnic area overlooking the bay and the beach!

title: (15960) O Touro - 52 Lugar Touro
description: Free parking, beautiful view by the beach, showers on the beach. I stayed overnight with no problems.

title: (15959) Insuela - 14 Rúa Esteirón
description: Land parking to spend the day

title: (15969) Artes - 19 Lugar Gandara
description: Great parking to spend the night at 500m supermarkets and gas station beach less than 5m and a beach bar in front

title: (15967) O Castro - CP-7301
description: Parking from the viewpoint "Miradoiro Pedra da Ra". In the evening people come to watch the sunset. It can also have visitors later on weekends. Otherwise very quiet. Within 5 minutes you can reach the prehistoric hilltop settlement "Castro da Cidá" via beautiful hiking trails. It has no trash cans. PLEASE DO NOT LEAVE TRASH OR TOILET PAPER!!!

title: (15966) Ribeira - 74 Lugar Ameixida
description: Small parking by the beach, chirringuito, shower, picnic table, swing and slide. Not spent the night but surely possible, no ban reported. Super view!

title: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - Aldea Laxe
title_short: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - Aldea Laxe
description: Bay parking next to very quiet road next to beach. showers but no services. many beautiful beaches within walking didtance and many bars and seafood restaurants on the other beaches. the parking bays are quite small and the roads to the beach are also very small...if you go wrong...highly recommended for smaller vans and campers. no signs prohibiting motorhomes or overnight parking. busy on weekends

title: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 59 Lugar Laxe
title_short: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 59 Lugar Laxe
description: Parking next to the beach with plenty of shade. They charge €5 for motorhomes (€10 for staying overnight). It does not have any service, only parking.

title: (15969) Sirves - 70 Lugar Sirves
description: Parking of the sports center of the town. AC of 7 meters ok by the road. There is a narrow passage but it is passed. If you want tranquility, this is the place to rest. Today is Sunday, let's see Monday.

title: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 14 Aldea Laxe
title_short: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 14 Aldea Laxe
description: Private motorhome area located 400m from the beach, totally closed plot and guarded 24 hours. Electricity in pitches, toilets with hot water in showers, sinks, washing machine, barbecue area, completely flat pitches. A great place to spend a few days of relaxation and tranquility in an unbeatable environment. CHECK-IN To check-in you need ID and credit card. It is done using an automatic machine where, if the instructions are followed correctly, it is a simple process: 1. Select the number of nights you want to spend the night. 2. Choose the plot, (check size) and if you need electricity or not. 3. Scan your ID (place the document photo face up) and press READ. 4. Press pay to make the payment. 5. Make the payment with your card by passing it through the reader or entering it in the dataphone (marking your pin on it) The machine will issue you your payment ticket, ticket with information about the plot and the access card, which you have to go through the reader located at the barriers to enter. With this card you can enter and leave the area as many times as you want during your stay. RENEWAL OF STAY: If you want to renew your stay, make a check out in the machine before ending the current stay (options - checkout) Then make a new check-in.

title: (15967) Ribeira - 50 CP-7302
description: Good surfing atmosphere, good sunsets, close to the beach with cold water outdoor showers and daily clean toilets. Respect the places and they will remain as we want them

title: (15993) - 13 Lugar Axeitos
description: Ample parking of the Dolmen de Axeitos. With a certain influx of visitors.

title: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 4 Rua 1 Lombiña
title_short: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 4 Rua 1 Lombiña
description: Ground parking with shade, very saturated on weekends, a very nice beach with beach bars and restaurants, public toilets.

title: (15969) Ribeira - 182 Estrada Xeral
description: Public parking attached to a recreational area. We slept there one night and nobody bothered us.

title: (15969) Riveira - 190 Lugar Areeiros
description: Flat place, excellent to sleep, quiet, without shade, quiet, next to the beach, very good views of the island of Sálvora, without services.

name: Camping Ria De Arosa I

description: Camping near the sea. Beautiful scenery. Do not come with a motorhome longer than 7.50 m. Good for spending one or two days, far from shops, sanitary facilities, clean, wifi throughout the campsite, free

title: () A Pobra do Caramiñal - CP-6705
description: View of the sea and the setting sun sinking into it. Right on a street with little traffic at least at night. Further up the road comes a nice lookout point with picnic areas.

title: () A Pobra do Caramiñal - CP-6705
description: All in height on the view of the sea and sunset next to the meadows where there are horses and cows. Without services and take away your waste

title: (15967) Ribeira - 7 Lugar Ameixida
description: "A Finca de Vera", totally closed with electricity, water and covered barbecue, small playground, hammocks and shaded spaces, BEWARE! We do not have a bathroom or water discharge

title: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - Aldea Cabío
title_short: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - Aldea Cabío
description: Esplanade with picnic tables and a cement barbecue. Quite closed with trees, collected and shaded. Very nice flirt and with access on foot to beaches in the area. 500 meters from beach bars. It does not have any services, nor showers, nor water intake. Perfect place to spend the night without any problem.

title: (15940) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 3 Rua Castelao
title_short: (15940) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 3 Rua Castelao

title: (15948) A Aldea Vella - CP-6705
description: Next to the main parking lot of A curotiña, next to a horse trough on the ground. Magnificent view and close to the RP.02B path (which connects with A and with PRG263).

title: (15994) Porto do Son - 61 Lugar Novas
description: Very large parking lot of the House of Culture. At the foot of a forest and with shade. 10min from the Dolmen de Axeitos. Very little traffic, access by paved road.

title: (15967) Couso - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful pine forest equipped with tables and stone benches and barbecues, they have a play area for children, we did not spend the night but there were more vans and motorhomes, I understand that they were going to stay, a fairly flat area although with some potholes due to the roots of the trees, near two beaches where you can go with dogs without problems, in the middle of August we brought two poodles and there were more people with them since there were hardly any people and there is no lifeguard service on them, clear and clean water, very sheltered from the wind, we loved the zons

title: (15967) Ribeira - Aldea Trasportó
description: Parking Mirador de Couso. Great views of the sea, very quiet. It is accessible by a dirt road without difficulty. There are benches and tables. There is no type of service.

title: () A Pobra do Caramiñal - CP-6705
description: Amazing place to visit. Beautiful views

title: (15967) Ribeira - Unnamed Road
description: Relaxed parking next to the beach. Amazing view. Noise free night. Had no problem to get here with a 7.6m motorhome

title: (15969) Corrubedo - 5 Rúa Chaprado
description: Lawn parking in the middle of the town of Corrubedo. Ideal to spend the night sheltered from the wind. It has no services. Easy access for AC and campers. Very spacious.

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - Unnamed Road
description: Little piece of land on the side of the road, next to the sea, quiet and with beautiful views. There is a path right next door with access to the beach.

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet parking surrounded by nature and very close to La Secada beach. It is located next to a soccer field. Lots of shade and level.

title: (15994) FURNA BRAVA CAMPER PARK

Located a few meters from the sea, you can fall asleep to the sound of the ocean and wake up to the wonderful song of the birds that inhabit the lagoon. A unique experience in a movie setting.

title: (15994) Porto do Son - Unnamed Road

title: (15969) - 5 Camiño Ladeira

Only downside, the waste and other toilet paper left on the ground, like a little everywhere unfortunately ... please, do not leave anything on the floor.

surrounded by trees and cows. in front there are wind farm mills.

title_short: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 29B Lugar As Aceñas

title: (15995) Porto do Son - 1 Lugar Trasdoanes
description: A perfect place to relax by the sea. Sitting down to dinner watching the sunset is priceless. There are very few places with such charm.

title: (15995) Porto do Son - 1 Lugar Trasdoanes
description: Parking for beach visitors, sloping, sandy but firm surface. Fantastic view of the Furnas beach in the municipality of Xuño. A few meters further there is a bar and a restaurant.

title: (36626) Isla de Arosa -

title_short: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 10 Barrio as Aceñas

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 1 Lugar Bao

On weekends it gets full of cars but in the afternoon there are places. Very flat and with streetlights. Very quiet and 50 meters from the beach. Showers on the beach during lifeguard hours (12:30 to 20:00)

title: (15992) Boiro - 49 Lugar Peralto
description: Super equipped laundry!! I pay both in cash and by card. Very comfortable service. The area is very nice and pleasant to wait while doing the laundry. Very good prices. It has a bakery opposite, a playground and cafeterias next door. Highly recommended.

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 12 Barrio as Aceñas
title_short: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 12 Barrio as Aceñas

title: (36626) Arousa - 28 Travesía Riason
description: Beautiful little place right on the beach. Easy access for AC camper. It is next to an industrial warehouse but there is no noise or smell. Beach bar a few meters away and several coves.

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 1 Lugar Bao
description: The Oasis Bar is closed, and the outside parking spaces are great for 3 ac. Inside it is forbidden to park. Much quieter than the ac area next to the bridge, as cars pass much further.

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 12 Barrio as Aceñas
title_short: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 12 Barrio as Aceñas

name: Camping Salinas
title: (36626) Camping Salinas
description: Camping Salinas (2 stars), but with the bare essentials. Very clean bathrooms. Friendly and pleasant welcome. Direct access to the beach. The only downside I saw is the lack of closing time for the children's area, because if you have an adjacent property and want to sleep early you will have a hard time until around 12pm. Beach bar attached to the campsite and others along the beautiful 2 km long beach walk. Barbecue area with approx. 5 places.

title: (36626) - s/n Barrio as Aceñas

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - Carretera Po-M
description:
Good place, at the end of crossing the Illa Arousa bridge. Many motorhomes and well organized. ,.
We must respect the parking areas, do not remove chairs or tables as we can be very annoying and it is forbidden.
The bar there is a very good tapas and wine list at a good price and they are open until October.

INSTRUCTIONS:
1 Approach the barrier so that it opens.
2 Park.
3 Go to the payment machine, enter the days of stay.
4 Pay with credit/debit card.

description: Quiet place, there are houses next door, good place to park and spend the night, very cool beach next door, no services.

description: Parking serving the beaches. Beautiful area. Magnificent view. No service. Nice beach next door. Nudist beach nearby (but not in sight). On the other hand a lot of wind. The corner is famous for the practice of kite surfing is not for nothing.

title: (36988) - 20 Lugar Gandariña

title: (36988) - 15C Lugar Gandariña

But barking dogs all night.

description: Washing of vehicles with possibility of loading water. They have a brush with two water rinsing areas inside the same box (the big one is perfect for a 6-meter van) so you can clean the windows and tires before washing under pressure. The washing pressure is excellent, waxed and very good (about 3 minutes for each euro). They are super nice and let fill with water if you wash the van. They do not have a specific emptying area for motorhomes (gray and black water), but they have a bathroom. Great place recommended before entering the island of Arousa or preparing the trip by leaving it.

name: Área de autocaravanas Camper Cambados
title: (36634) Área de autocaravanas Camper Cambados
description: Motorhome area in Cambados. Payment by card and phone only. Possibility of reservation subject to availability. Located in the capital of Albariño wine and just a 10-minute walk along the coastal path from the Monumental and Restoration Area of Cambados. The area is in a quiet area next to a pond with a mill and on an avenue full of services such as 24-hour supermarkets, gas stations and 24-hour laundries. Water and sewage are included in the price. There are also some pitches with electricity. The area is under video surveillance with a 24 hour recording.
